title: WHY BUILD YOUR PERSONAL BRAND?

section1.heading: WHAT DO THEY HAVE IN COMMON?

section2.explanation: All these people built up their personal brands by acting, singing, TV, or social media. When they started businesses, their companies EXPLODED.
section2.explanation2: Their personal brand was their marketing. Social media is the best way for your average person to do this without being an actor, singer, or athlete.

statistics.description: Use social media to research products
Purchase decisions made on social media

callout: There is a HUGE opportunity here. If you don't take it, your competitors will - and they'll take all your customers with them.
